${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPower.NAME: Example 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:StrFixation.NAME: Strength Fixation
DESCRIPTIONS: You're focused on offense, all future dexterity becomes strength for #b

${ModID}:DexFixation.NAME: Dexterity Fixation
DESCRIPTIONS: You're focused on defense, all future strength becomes dexterity for #b

{ModID}:ScalingVigorPower.NAME: Scaling Vigor
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Attack each turn gains #b
+2 additional Vigor than the previous one this turn.

{ModID}:ScalingBlockPower.NAME: Scaling Block
DESCRIPTIONS: The first Skill each turn grants #b
+2 additional Block than the previous one this turn.

{ModID}:Tasty.NAME: Tasty
DESCRIPTIONS: The first buff and debuff each turn is increased by 1
